article_title: How David Brooks Created Donald Trump

article_metadata.description: Donald Trump has risen to the top of the GOP presidential field by appealing to resentments our two political tribes have stoked. Even Brooks is even doing it, right there in his column.
article_metadata.author: Michael F. Cannon

og.description: Donald Trump has risen to the top of the GOP presidential field by appealing to resentments our two political tribes have stoked. Even Brooks is even doing it, right there in his column.
og.title: How David Brooks Created Donald Trump
